write-dist-folder-path-on-deploy-target-.description: Sets the distFolderPath option on the deploy target. distFolderPath is now required.

replace-buildtarget-for-depends-on.description: Remove the option `buildTarget` and `noBuild` from the deploy target. If the option `buildTarget` was set, the migration will create a new target to build the library with the desired configuration and create a `dependsOn` on the deploy target to build the library using the just-created target.
